name: Dunkz - Basketball game
description:
Shoot hoops and dunk in this bouncy basketball game.

Tap to bounce like flappy games and score as many dunks as possible before the timeout. Dunkz is destined to be a smash hit so try it for FREE!

In this endless basketball game, get on fire with a sequence of swish (a shot which goes through the net without hitting the rim or backboard) and win more points. Be careful of airball (a shot that fails to hit the rim or backboard).

So just one goal: shoot hoops and slam dunk without hitting the rim or backboard to get more points!

Challenge your friends and beat their highscores! Beware of the buzzer!

Explore the new mode: Missions and achieve them all!

Download Dunkz now for FREE, it's the next hit!

Game features:
◉ Free
◉ Easy gameplay (flappy style)
◉ Endless gameplay
◉ Missions
◉ Offline friendly

Crafted with love under the sun of Montpellier and the freshness of French Alps by Pixel Rocket game studio.
